description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8vmgm","text":"Protocol for analysing mitochondrial oxygen consumption using the Seahorse XFe96 analyzer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8jr0q","text":"Seed cells in 10 cm plates aiming for a confluency of ~80-90% at the time of treatment ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vi33","text":"Add   of Seahorse XFe calibrant solution to each well of a Seahorse (Agilent) cartridge plate, and incubate   at   in a CO2-free incubator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":108,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":113,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8jsj3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"si6p","text":"Isolate mitochondria (see previously published protocol) with the following modifications: cells were scraped into ice cold modified isolation buffer (70 mM sucrose, 210 mM mannitol, 1 mM EGTA, 0.5% w/v BSA (fatty acid free), 5 mM HEPES pH 7.2), cell pellets were stored on ice prior to homogenization, and mitochondrial samples were stored on ice and immediately assayed after quantification ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1l8hb","text":"Aliquot out  of mitochondria per sample, diluting each aliquot to a final volume of   in mitochondrial assay solution (MAS: 70 mM sucrose, 220 mM mannitol, 10 mM KH2PO4, 5 mM MgCl26H2O, 1 mM EGTA, 0.1% w/v BSA (fatty acid free), 2 mM HEPES pH 7.2), and leave the samples on ice until needed ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dhg17","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pr52","text":"Make up the substrate solution (10 mM Glutamate, 10 mM malate in MAS buffer) and place at   in a CO2 free incubator for at least ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":90,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":128,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ehohk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fq2ce","text":"To the equilibrated cartridge plate, load   of 20 mM ADP,  50 ug/uL oligomycin,   of 10 uM FCCP,   of 40 uM of Antimycin A into the corresponding ports of each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":80,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ehd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"22","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"24","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"26","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2jbq8","text":"Incubate the cartridge at  in a CO2-free incubator for  , and begin the calibration sequence on the Seahorse XFe96 analyser so that it’s completion corresponds with step 12 (takes ~ ). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":55,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":181,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ba0jo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4i8vr","text":"Centrifuge the plate at  , and place the plate on ice until required ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6q83d","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"2000","duration":1200,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90l2t","text":"During step 8, add a   aliquot of mitochondria to each corresponding well of the prechilled Seahorse sample plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fso2i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"765qn","text":"Add  of pre-warmed substrate solution to each sample well ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"84nfa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"155","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75eds","text":" Eject the calibration plate from the analyser and replace it with the sample plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6s9gu","text":"Run the following protocol on the analyser: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9plm","text":"Basal (3 min mix, 3 min measure, 3 min mix, 3 min measure)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8cng9","text":"ADP (injection, 30 sec mix, 3 min measure)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48f1t","text":"Oligomycin (injection, 30 sec mix, 30 sec wait, 3 min measure)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfgt","text":"FCCP (injection, 20 sec mix, 3 min measure)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crsdp","text":"Antimycin A (injection, 30 sec mix, 3 min measure)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2lcrp","text":"If analysing mitochondrial respiration across multiple days, perform step 2 of day 1 the day before the time point analysis, and perform step 3 – 14 on each day of the time course with the appropriate vehicle controls each day. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Analysing mitochondrial oxygen consumption using the Seahorse XFe96 analyzer
